description: Works perfectly, Nice UI, Fast, Easy to use and I like the way it fades.
Nice app, maybe a little too bare-bones. It would be great if it supported more image formats and multiple backgrounds in one .xml file.
summary: Good tool, has a room for improvement

description: A simple app to create light/dark wallpaper combinations.
Not only creates the dynamic wallpaper" but also puts them as an available choice on the change background settings window, so you don't have to go looking for the file! Perfect!
summary: I love small apps that do exactly what they are supposed to!

description:
Exactly what I was hoping for. Not only looks great with Libadwaita, but does exactly what it says on the tin.

The only thing I'd like more is for there to be a thumbnail preview of the files when you've selected them. However, even without that, it's fantastic.
Simple, effective, no bells and whistles here. Awesome.
It does what it's meant to, it automatically adds the wallpapers to the list instead of the user having to use gnome tweaks to apply an xml, and doing all this while looking spectacular
